name: storytel-player
description: Storytel Unofficial Player - Storytel audiobook player for desktop

scripts.server: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.client: cd client && npm install && npm start
scripts.server:dev: cd server && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.electron:dist: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder
scripts.electron:dist:win: npm run build-win && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --windows --x64
scripts.electron:dist:linux:x64: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --x64 -l tar.gz deb rpm AppImage
scripts.electron:dist:linux:arm64: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --arm64 -l tar.gz deb rpm AppImage
scripts.electron:dist:linux:arm: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --armv7l -l tar.gz deb rpm AppImage
scripts.electron:dist:linux: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.electron:dist:mac:x64: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.electron:dist:mac:arm64: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.preelectron:pack: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build
scripts.preelectron: npm run build && npm run server:build
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; rm -rf server/dist; rm -rf client/build

author: debba <andrea@debbaweb.it>
